name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Sticky Header Hider aka Fixed Header Fixer

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Makes it easier to read articles by hiding sticky elements of webpages, so they don't follow you and waste your screen space whileâ€¦

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Makes it easier to read articles by hiding sticky elements of webpages, so they don't follow you and waste your screen space while you scroll down the page.
